name: The Harvester (Papouth)
description:
Your mission :
You have 3 minutes to harvest and bring as many eggs as possible to your nests. Be careful not to make omelettes!

Controls :

Movements : ZQSD
Collect / Drop an egg : E
Ascend : SPACE
Descend : LEFTCONTROL

This game was made in less than a day for a school project. The theme of this 1 day jam was "fantastic creatures".

All the assets are from the asset store of Unity.

Enjoy the games !
